messages.content: play tic tac toe with me

Sounds fun! Shall we begin? Here is a simple tic tac toe board:

_ _ _
_ _ _ 
_ _ _

It's your turn first, would you like to go first with X or O? Please type the location you want to place your marker, example A1, B3, C2.

Okay, here is the board updated with your X in A1:  

X _ _   
_ _ _
_ _ _

My turn! I will place an O in B3.

X _ _
_ _ O    
_ _ _

Your turn again!

Here is the board updated:

X _ _    
_ X _   
_ _ _

My turn! I will place an O in A3.  

X _ O   
_ X _  
_ _ _

Your turn!

Here is the updated board:

X _ O    
_ X _
_ _ X

My turn! I will place an O in C1.

X O O   
_ X _
_ _ X

Your turn!
